Name: I Am - a story of awakenings
About the game: Where are you? Why can’t you remember anything? You meet the mysterious Mr. Shadow who claims to have set you free, but in return wants your help to do... what exactly? Sneak past moronic but highly dangerous guards, evade and fight enemies using their own weapons against them, and unravel the mystery of who you are. I Am – a story of awakenings is a story-driven first-person action game. Game play features puzzles, stealth, dialogue, physics, grenade dodging, payback, and lots and lots of explosions. This game is relatively short and will take around one and a half to three hours to complete, depending on your play style and experience with FPS games.
